SCATTERGUN.effect: Fires 10 bullets for 5 damage each that randomly strike enemy parts. Each bullet has a 10% chance to miss.
SCATTERGUN.flavor: Alright you Primitive Screwheads, listen up! You see this? This... is my boomstick!

ROCKET PUNCH.effect: Punches a specified enemy part for (40-80) damage. Your equipped part takes half the damage you deal.
ROCKET PUNCH.flavor: Mechs are equipped with powerful artillery capable of wiping out entire cities. Who cares, let's punch them in the face instead. Rockets included!

SWORD.effect: Launches an aggressive assault on all four limbs with flat damage of 5 and a 50% chance to crit for double damage.
SWORD.flavor: While guns are all the rage, you can't beat a classic.

FLAMETHROWER.effect: Engulfs the enemy in fire dealing 10 damage to all limbs and double damage to the chest. Burns for 3-5 seconds after the initial burn for another 3 damage per second.
FLAMETHROWER.flavor: Sometimes mech owners find it a struggle to aim. This module takes care of that.

RAILGUN.effect: Launches an immense spike toward a given part of the body. Deals 50 damage to a limb or 100 to the chest. On limbs, has a 10% chance of shearing a targeted limb off completely.
RAILGUN.flavor: Many people believe that there is such a thing as too much firepower. Here at Mech inc., we disagree.
